name: Automox
description:
Automox is the IT automation platform for modern organizations. Utilizing this app allows for the orchestration of IT operations such as device management, triggering remote
outcomes on endpoints, and basic Automox platform administration.

page_limit.description: Change how many results are returned on a page (default is 100)
page_limit.name: page_limit

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Schedule a policy for immediate remediation
actions.verbose: Use this action to run a policy/worklet on a specific device. For example, you can craft an incident response worklet in your console and use this action to call it.

actions.description: List all the policies available in your organization
actions.verbose: List all the policies available in your organization. For example, you can use this action to get policy data (like a Policy ID) that you can use or pass to other actions.

actions.description: This action is used to retrieve Automox managed devices
actions.verbose: This action is used to retrieve Automox managed devices. For example, you can use this action to get device data that you can use or pass to other actions.

actions.description: This action is used to retrieve Automox organizations
actions.verbose: This action is used to retrieve Automox organizations that the authenticated user belongs to.

actions.description: This action is used to retrieve a list of software installed on a device
actions.verbose: This action is used to retrieve a list of software installed on a device.

actions.description: Retrieve data for a specific device in the AX Console.
actions.verbose: Retrieve data for a specific device in the AX Console.

actions.description: This action is used to retrieve users of the Automox organization
actions.verbose: This action is used to retrieve users of the Automox organization.

actions.description: This action is used to find an Automox device by IP address
actions.verbose: This action is used to find an Automox device by IP address. You can provide a private or public IP address.

org_id.description: Identifier of organization to restrict results
org_id.name: org_id

actions.description: This action is used to list Automox groups
actions.verbose: This action is used to list Automox groups

org_id.description: Identifier of organization to restrict results
org_id.name: org_id

actions.description: Use this action to return a list of queued up commands for a device
actions.verbose: Use this action to return a list of queued up commands for a device

actions.description: Use this action to remove a user from an account
actions.verbose: Use this action to remove a user from an account.

account_id.description: Account UUID to retrieve users for.
account_id.name: account_id

actions.description: Use this action to update a device in the console.
actions.verbose: Use this action to update a device in the console.

exception.description: Exclude the device from reports and statistics
exception.name: exception

custom_name.description: Custom name to set on device
custom_name.name: custom_name

actions.description: Use this action to delete a device from the console.
actions.verbose: Use this action to delete a device from the console.
